name: Protagonist(P4)
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Glasses》 character and up to one character with "&" in its card name, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may choose a trait. If you do, until the next time you choose a trait with this ability, this card gets the chosen trait.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Emerged Izanagi" is in your climax area, all of your 《Magic》 characters get +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Izanagi!!

name: Yosuke in Yukata
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, return your opponent's battle character into your opponent's hand, your opponent chooses a card in his or her hand and puts it into your opponent's waiting room.
flavor_text: …We fail, huh? An epic fail…

name: Protagonist & Izanagi-no-Okami
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +X power. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the level of the character facing this card.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Myriad Truths" is in your climax area, your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either.)
flavor_text: Izanami-no-Okami: "Impossible… Can the will of so few surpass the will of all mankind!?"

name: Loves Junes! Nanako
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Junes" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Huh? We can buy one? At Junes?

name: Store Manager's Son, Yosuke
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is one or more 《Junes》 characters among those cards, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. If there are two or more 《Junes》 characters among those cards, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. If there are three or more 《Junes》 characters among those cards, you may choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters on the center stage, and put it into your opponent's stock.
flavor_text: Welcome, one and all! Choice salmon, 59 yen a slice, just as advertised!

name: Nanako Dojima
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Protagonist(P4)" [(1)] （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Protagonist(P4)" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with 《Hero》 or "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: My school's on the way, so… let's go together.

name: Liquor Store's Daughter, Saki Konishi
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Junes》 characters get +1000 power.
【CONT】 Alarm When this card is the top card of your clock, all of your 《Junes》 characters get +1000 power.
flavor_text: He doesn't have too many friends, so I hope you two get along good.

name: Friendly Siblings, Protagonist & Nanako
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the level of the character facing this card.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: But I'm not lonely… You're here with me.

name: Leader, Protagonist
ability: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put a climax from your waiting room into your memory] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card attacks, if a card named "Never More" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.

name: Signs of a Family, Dojima
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Friendly Siblings, Protagonist & Nanako" [(1)] （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Friendly Siblings, Protagonist & Nanako" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose another character, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn.
flavor_text: So, I'll fill yours and Nanako's mugs anytime.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with 《Brave》 or "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name get +500 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters named "Protagonist & Izanagi-no-Okami", and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose another character, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.

flavor_text: If you're really me, you should already know... Fists never lie!

name: Naoto & Yamato Takeru
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Male Impersonator》 or 《Female Impersonator》 character, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Now is the time! Let's go!

name: "The 2000-IQ Killjoy Detective" Naoto Shirogane
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Male Impersonator》 or 《Female Impersonator》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card."
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: "The body of a child, the brain of a genius!"

name: Full Power Follow Up, Naoto
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is being frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavor_text: Try not to overdo it. There is a limit to how much I can follow up.

name: Middle of a Long Journey, Elizabeth
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: I now have a wish of my own…

name: Infinite Possibilities, Naoto
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Megidolaon" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card."

【AUTO】 Change [(3) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do so, choose a card named "Naoto & Yamato Takeru" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: This potential… was still dormant within me…

name: Paper Thin Teddie
ability: 【AUTO】 [(4)] At the beginning of your opponent's encore step, if this card is on the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】."
flavor_text: Wh-What in the world!? Nooo… My fine, silky fur… I was so proud of it! Waaaah…

name: Naoto Shirogane
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your characters with 《Police》 or "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2000 Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Your "game" will soon reach its end…

name: One who Wields Power, Margaret
ability: 【AUTO】 [(3)] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put three cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, put up to one card from the top of your clock into your waiting room. If there is an event among those cards, put all cards in your stock into your waiting room, and 【STAND】 this card.
flavor_text: As the one who rules over power… I will fight with the utmost deference to you.

name: Detective Prince, Naoto
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Male Impersonator》 or 《Female Impersonator》 characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to three times per turn. When your other 《Male Impersonator》 or 《Female Impersonator》 character is placed on stage from hand, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: My name is Naoto Shirogane. I'm investigating the multiple murders that have occurred here.

name: Teddie in Yukata
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 This ability activates up to three times per turn. When you play an event, choose one of your characters, and that character gets power +1000 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A couple walking together at a festival… Unused to wearing it, the girl's yukata comes loose… Summer has begun.

name: "The Beast in Heat" Teddie
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is on the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavor_text: "The void that swallows all!"

name: "Assertion of Youth" Teddie
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, each player returns all cards in the waiting room to his or her deck. Each player shuffles his or her deck afterwards.
flavor_text: The splattering fruit juice! Bursts of joy! One night of love… The bitter sweetness of those days is the essence of youth!!

name: Companion on a Journey, Margaret
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 2 or higher characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Aria of the Soul" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Hence, Block Fro……… I didn't mispronounce it.

name: Undercover Investigation, Naoto
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power or each of your other 《Male Impersonator》 or 《Female Impersonator》 characters.

【AUTO】 [(1)]: When this card attacks, if a card named "Charging into the Announcement Room!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw two cards, choose a card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I will stop her... no matter what!

name: Teddie
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Glasses》 characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets 《Glasses》 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Of course I've prepared glasses for everyone.

name: Teddie & Kintoki-Douji
ability: 【AUTO】 Change [(3) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Teddie & Kamui" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position this card was on.

【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 1500 Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: …what's wrong with being a shadow! There must be something that only I can do!

name: Naoto & Sukuna-Hikona
flavor_text: But you are me… and I am you. You've always been inside me.

name: Miss "Teddie"
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, put a card from the top of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, this card gets +4 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Calling herself 'King of the TV World,' She's a cute, sexy little number!"

name: Investigation Team, Teddie
ability: 【CONT】 Assist During your opponent's turn, all of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text:
But I had friends who
understood me in the end.

name: New Legend of Teddie
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Mabufudyne" is on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and put that card on top of your deck.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: I have a powerful attack, an unbeatable defense, and a winning smile! Today begins the New Legend of Teddie!

name: Sailor Uniform Naoto
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "My Christmas Eve" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to one character with "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: So I figured I should look more like a girl…

name: Teddie & Kamui
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each card in your hand.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: "The Imperious Queen of Executions" Mitsuru Kirijo
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
【ACT】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +3000 power until end of your opponent's next turn.

ability: 【COUNTER】 Your opponent may choose one of your characters, and return that character to your hand. Choose one of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it.

name: Megidolaon
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Yosuke Hanamura
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Beauty Pageant? Miss Protagonist
flavor_text: Presenting our transfer student who's been breaking hearts in the second-year class 2, Miss Protagonist!

name: Protagonist's Partner, Yosuke
ability: 【AUTO】 Change [(3) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Yosuke & Susano-O" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Investigation Team, Yu
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is on the stage, this card's card name will also be regarded as "Investigation Team, Protagonist".

When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Right, Let's do this.

name: Yosuke & Jiraiya
ability: 【CONT】 When this card is played from your hand, you may choose one of your cards named "Yosuke Hanamura", and put it into your waiting room. If you do, you may play this card with 0 cost.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Yosuke & Susano-O
ability: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Brave Blade" is placed on your climax area, if all of your opponent's characters are 【REST】, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Brave Blade" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: Kanji Tatsumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: Underestimate me, and this is what you get.

name: Real Strength, Kanji
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may choose one of your opponent's 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 it.

【AUTO】 Change [(2) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kanji & Rokuten Maou" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Kanji & Take-Mikazuchi
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use "Backup", choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Kanji & Rokuten Maou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Mighty Swing" is in your climax area, until end of turn, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."

【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

ability: 【CONT】 If your opponent does not have any 【STAND】 characters, this card gets +2000 power.

flavor_text: Please come again… Heeheehee.

ability: Choose up to two characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.

name: Mighty Swing
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters gets +2 soul.

name: Salvation
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Idol on a Break, Risette

This is farewell!
Here goes, Final break!
